hero.title: Reduce Token Usage
hero.subtitle: Prompt Distillation & Translation API for Token Optimization

flowchart.title: How It Works
flowchart.subtitle: Our 3-step process to consolidate prompts to reduce token usage.

distillation.title: 1. Prompt Distillation
distillation.description: We use a lightweight model to distill verbose (i.e., voice-transcripted) prompts into barebones instructions.

translation.title: 2. Chinese Translation
translation.description: Translate prompt to Chinese, which requires 20-30% fewer tokens to convey the same meaning.

integration.title: 3. API Integration
integration.description: Layer on top of existing API calls to your models, no infrastructure changes needed

example.title: Sustainability with Negligible Quality Loss.
example.subtitle: Compare raw AI prompts with our eco-optimized versions.

startingImage.title: Starting Image
startingImage.description: Original image to be edited with different prompts with Gemini Nanobanana.

rawPrompt.title: Raw Prompt (transcriped with Wispr Flow)
rawPrompt.description: I will upload you a photo that I would like you to enhance and modify for me. Can you please add some beautiful stars and a crescent half moon to the sky portion of this image? I want it to have twinkling stars scattered across the heavens along with a graceful half moon to create a more magical nighttime atmosphere...

validation.title: Sustainability Research & Validation
validation.subtitle: Our optimization algorithms are backed by environmental research and rigorous testing to ensure both quality and sustainability.

qualityMetrics.title: Environmental Quality
qualityMetrics.description: Comprehensive evaluation of output quality with minimal environmental impact

sustainabilityGains.title: Sustainability Impact
sustainabilityGains.description: Measurable improvements in energy efficiency and environmental footprint

environmentalImpact.title: Planet Impact
environmentalImpact.description: Contributing to a sustainable future through responsible AI development

api.title: Sustainable API & Dashboard
api.subtitle: Integrate our eco-friendly optimization engine into your workflow. Monitor your environmental impact and contribute to sustainable AI development.

apiFeatures.title: Green API
apiFeatures.description: Environmentally conscious HTTP endpoints for prompt optimization

dashboardFeatures.title: Sustainability Dashboard
dashboardFeatures.description: Monitor your environmental impact and track sustainability metrics

cta.title: Ready to Go Green?
